item.description: Please note this is a change in venue from what was originally posted. The band will be playing in Tewksbury at the Back Stage Grille. They do take reservations here so please respond by noon on the 3rd so I have a fairly accurate number. The music starts around 9. Come early to have dinner or munch on an appetizer, chat and meet some new friends. Always a fun time with this band. Come on out and enjoy!

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Dancing with Four on the Floor
